title: Removing the microSD card causes data loss
answer:
It will not be possible to recover any data that has already been lost. 

 If your phone contains a microSD card, please ensure that you unmount it or turn off your phone before removing the card. Failure to do so could result in loss of microSD card data. 

 Go to Settings, select Storage > Unmount SD card and then remove the microSD card carefully.
keywords: remove the microSD card, lost microSD card data, data loss
